post.body: For kicks. Happened to me 2 or 3 years ago and my old site never recovered.
You're running Akismet, right?
Thanks mate :) I just want them published wherever they'll help the most people at this point. Got some more packs to work on!
Actually using that already for the Grass in the icons ;) But thank you for helping! I've decided to try drawing some soil of my own
Trying to put together some nice icon packs for the community :) They're standard icons for social networking sites. Thanks!
I can't share them with everyone until I get (a) $75 license for one of the images or (b) A New image for the dirt/roots on the edges
@film_girl Thanks!
Just sent you an email. Forgive typos! I'm one finger shorter than usual right now!
Steven Snell, you're quickly becoming a hero of mine :) Thanks for mentioning T9 in that PSDTUTS post :)
Glad it's back mate. And glad you're back, you've been quieter than usual. Liking your new avatar mate :)
I signed in just fine after remaking... Try again?
I like my intuos 3 just fine for the things I do :)
Not sure if this one will go anywhere or not yet: http://tinyurl.com/3urrzm
Going to See if @smashingmag is interested in releasing this icon set: http://tinyurl.com/4zbr8r
Check it out! http://tinyurl.com/425rqv
heh... this icon pack is killer
*Starts Drawing His Own Roots/Dirt*
Help me find an image? So I can give this back to you? http://tinyurl.com/3g8w4w
Really need a photo like this: http://tinyurl.com/44c4sb that doesn't require $75 for redistribution
Some Icons I just made: http://shrunkin.com/14553/ And http://shrunkin.com/14554/
Just finished Two Social Bookmarking Icon Packs :) Gonna put em up for free download on Tutorial9 soon.
Gift Of Knowledge Post Idea #4: Write roundup of favorite design books > Win Prizes > Help a child in need! http://tutorial9.net/give/
RT @UXBooth New on UX Booth: Usable Human Connections Through the Web http://tinyurl.com/48jsem
Coffee Time :)
Got some new ads in our inventory at http://www.uxbooth.com/ - Get'em while they last! Starting at $10!
So apparently Stumble Upon lets you share things with friends. I just got to go through all the things people sent me, haha
Retweeting @UXBooth: Check out the new features and updates at the UX Booth http://tinyurl.com/9axr2g
Gonna be in Atlanta talking about Blog monetization on January 7th. Be sure to come if you can! http://is.gd/ehDt
Uh... https://twitter.com/UX_Gnome
Blog By Design is a really interesting concept. Give it a stumble if you have a moment: http://bit.ly/xH0e (Fixed URL)
Retweeting @styletime: I said http://styl.eti.me is back ;) lol sorry just really Happy!
Design Float appears to be mostly back online - though my account is deleted, and only 4 posts are on the front page.
If you've got a Stumble Upon Account, we could really use some love on http://www.uxbooth.com/ right now :) Thanks!
Retweeting @UXBooth: 4 Reasons your product (or site) NEEDS to be usable: http://tinyurl.com/89nxk4
Thanks for all your feedback folks. You're all so helpful :)
Need some help: If you go to http://www.uxbooth.com/ and want to subscribe, what's the FIRST thing you do?
G'night folks. Calling it a night.
Retweeting @josieg182: RT @jophillips: Could certainly use some help here: http://tinyurl.com/8lto59 (15 minimalist designs - on Digg) :)
mmmmmm mmm mm. Chocolate Sandwiches never fail to delight.
I have the best mom in the world. Even if she does nag at me for hours on the phone.
